title: 求一些指令的权限
author: 拉普达
txt_content:
hat帽子
sethome设置家
home回家 
nick改昵称
me
tpa 
tpahere

replies.author: yx522503421
replies.txt_content:
essentials.hat
essentials.sethome
essentials.home
essentials.nick
essentials.tpa
essentials.tpahere
要禁掉这些的话，直觉manduaddp 玩家 -essentials.xxx 那个-就是禁掉这个指令的权限

replies.author: 海牛的麻烦
replies.txt_content:
添加给玩家manuaddp+id+权限  添加给组mangaddp+组+权限 删除为manudelp和mangdelp
所列权限为
essentials.hat
essentials.sethome
essentials.home
essentials.nick
essentials.tpa
essentials.tpahere
